00051 //for synchronization.
00052 static std::string g_pciClockMaster;
00053 static float64 g_pciClockMasterRate = 0.0;
00054 static int g_daqmx_open_cnt;
00055 static XMutex g_daqmx_mutex;
00056 static std::deque<shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute> > g_daqmx_sync_routes;
00057 
00058 atomic_shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList>
00059 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::s_virtualTrigList(new XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTriggerList);
00060 XTalker<shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger> >
00061 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::s_onChange;
00062 shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger>
00063 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::create(const char *label, unsigned int bits)
00064 {
00065     shared_ptr<SoftwareTrigger> p(new SoftwareTrigger(label, bits));
00066     
00067     //atomically register.
00068     for(;;) {
00069         atomic_shared_ptr<SoftwareTriggerList> old_list(s_virtualTrigList);
00070         atomic_shared_ptr<SoftwareTriggerList> new_list(new SoftwareTriggerList(*old_list));
00071         new_list->push_back(p);
00072         if(new_list.compareAndSwap(old_list, s_virtualTrigList)) break;
00073     }
00074     onChange().talk(p);
00075     return p;
00076 }
00077 
00078 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::SoftwareTrigger(const char *label, unsigned int bits)
00079     : m_label(label), m_bits(bits),
00080       m_risingEdgeMask(0u), m_fallingEdgeMask(0u) {
00081     _clear();
00082 }
00083 void
00084 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::unregister(const shared_ptr<SoftwareTrigger> &p) {
00085     //atomically unregister.
00086     for(;;) {
00087         atomic_shared_ptr<SoftwareTriggerList> old_list(s_virtualTrigList);
00088         atomic_shared_ptr<SoftwareTriggerList> new_list(new SoftwareTriggerList(*old_list));
00089         new_list->erase(std::find(new_list->begin(), new_list->end(), p));
00090         if(new_list.compareAndSwap(old_list, s_virtualTrigList)) break;
00091     }
00092     onChange().talk(p);
00093 }
00094 void
00095 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::_clear() {
00096     uint64_t x;
00097     while(FastQueue::key t = m_fastQueue.atomicFront(&x)) {
00098         m_fastQueue.atomicPop(t);
00099     }
00100     m_slowQueue.clear();
00101     m_slowQueueSize = 0;
00102 }
00103 void
00104 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::stamp(uint64_t cnt) {
00105     readBarrier();
00106     if(cnt < m_endOfBlank) return;
00107     if(cnt == 0) return; //ignore.
00108     try {
00109         m_fastQueue.push(cnt);
00110     }
00111     catch (FastQueue::nospace_error&) {
00112         XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00113         fprintf(stderr, "Slow queue!\n");
00114         m_slowQueue.push_back(cnt);
00115         if(m_slowQueue.size() > 100000u)
00116             m_slowQueue.pop_front();
00117         else
00118             ++m_slowQueueSize;
00119     }
00120     m_endOfBlank = cnt + m_blankTerm;
00121 }
00122 void
00123 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::start(float64 freq) {
00124     {
00125         XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00126         m_endOfBlank = 0;
00127         if(!m_blankTerm) m_blankTerm = lrint(0.02 * freq);
00128         m_freq = freq;
00129         _clear();
00130     }
00131     onStart().talk(shared_from_this());
00132 }
00133 
00134 void
00135 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::stop() {
00136     XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00137     _clear();
00138     m_endOfBlank = (uint64_t)-1LL;
00139 }
00140 void
00141 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::connect(uint32_t rising_edge_mask, 
00142                                             uint32_t falling_edge_mask) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &) {
00143     XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00144     _clear();
00145     if(m_risingEdgeMask || m_fallingEdgeMask)
00146         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(
00147             KAME::i18n("Duplicated connection to virtual trigger is not supported."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00148     m_risingEdgeMask = rising_edge_mask;
00149     m_fallingEdgeMask = falling_edge_mask;
00150 }
00151 void
00152 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::disconnect() {
00153     XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00154     _clear();
00155     m_risingEdgeMask = 0;
00156     m_fallingEdgeMask = 0;
00157 }
00158 uint64_t
00159 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::tryPopFront(uint64_t threshold, float64 _freq) {
00160     unsigned int freq_em = lrint(freq());
00161     unsigned int freq_rc = lrint(_freq);
00162     unsigned int _gcd = gcd(freq_em, freq_rc);
00163     
00164     uint64_t cnt;
00165     if(m_slowQueueSize) {
00166         XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00167         if(FastQueue::key t = m_fastQueue.atomicFront(&cnt)) {
00168             if((cnt < m_slowQueue.front()) || !m_slowQueueSize) {
00169                 cnt = (cnt * (freq_rc / _gcd)) / (freq_em / _gcd);
00170                 if(cnt >= threshold)
00171                     return 0uLL;
00172                 if(m_fastQueue.atomicPop(t))
00173                     return cnt;
00174                 return 0uLL;
00175             }
00176         }
00177         if(!m_slowQueueSize)
00178             return 0uLL;
00179         cnt = m_slowQueue.front();
00180         cnt = (cnt * (freq_rc / _gcd)) / (freq_em / _gcd);
00181         if(cnt >= threshold)
00182             return 0uLL;
00183         m_slowQueue.pop_front();            
00184         --m_slowQueueSize;
00185         return cnt;
00186     }
00187     if(FastQueue::key t = m_fastQueue.atomicFront(&cnt)) {
00188         cnt = (cnt * (freq_rc / _gcd)) / (freq_em / _gcd);
00189         if(cnt >= threshold)
00190             return 0uLL;
00191         if(m_fastQueue.atomicPop(t))
00192             return cnt;
00193     }
00194     return 0uLL;
00195 }
00196 
00197 void
00198 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::clear(uint64_t now, float64 _freq) {
00199     unsigned int freq_em= lrint(freq());
00200     unsigned int freq_rc = lrint(_freq);
00201     unsigned int _gcd = gcd(freq_em, freq_rc);
00202     now = (now * (freq_em / _gcd)) / (freq_rc / _gcd);
00203 
00204     XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00205     uint64_t x;
00206     while(FastQueue::key t = m_fastQueue.atomicFront(&x)) {
00207         if(x <= now)
00208             m_fastQueue.atomicPop(t);
00209         else
00210             break;
00211     }
00212     while(m_slowQueue.size() && (m_slowQueue.front() <= now)) {
00213         m_slowQueue.pop_front();
00214         --m_slowQueueSize;
00215     }
00216 }
00217 void
00218 XNIDAQmxInterface::SoftwareTrigger::forceStamp(uint64_t now, float64 _freq) {
00219     unsigned int freq_em= lrint(freq());
00220     unsigned int freq_rc = lrint(_freq);
00221     unsigned int _gcd = gcd(freq_em, freq_rc);
00222     now = (now * (freq_em / _gcd)) / (freq_rc / _gcd);
00223         
00224     XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_mutex);
00225     ++m_slowQueueSize;
00226     m_slowQueue.push_front(now);
00227     std::sort(m_slowQueue.begin(), m_slowQueue.end());
00228 }

00230 const char *
00231 XNIDAQmxInterface::busArchType() const {
00232 #ifdef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00233     int32 bus;
00234     DAQmxGetDevBusType(devName(), &bus);
00235     switch(bus) {
00236     case DAQmx_Val_PCI:
00237     case DAQmx_Val_PCIe:
00238         return "PCI";
00239     case DAQmx_Val_PXI:
00240 //  case DAQmx_Val_PXIe:
00241         return "PXI";
00242     case DAQmx_Val_USB:
00243         return "USB";
00244     default:
00245         return "Unknown";
00246     }
00247 #else
00248     return "n/a";
00249 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00250 }
00251 void
00252 XNIDAQmxInterface::synchronizeClock(TaskHandle task)
00253 {
00254     if(!g_pciClockMaster.length() || (devName() == g_pciClockMaster)) {
00255         return;
00256     }
00257     const float64 rate = g_pciClockMasterRate;
00258     const std::string src = formatString("/%s/RTSI7", devName());
00259     
00260     if(productSeries() == std::string("M")) {
00261         if(busArchType() == std::string("PCI")) {
00262             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetRefClkSrc(task, src.c_str()));
00263             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetRefClkRate(task, rate));
00264         }
00265         if(busArchType() == std::string("PXI")) {
00266             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetRefClkSrc(task,"PXI_Clk10"));
00267             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetRefClkRate(task, 10e6));
00268         }
00269     }
00270     if(productSeries() == std::string("S")) {
00271         if(busArchType() == std::string("PCI")) {
00272             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetMasterTimebaseSrc(task, src.c_str()));
00273             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetMasterTimebaseRate(task, rate));
00274         }
00275         if(busArchType() == std::string("PXI")) {
00276             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetMasterTimebaseSrc(task,"PXI_Clk10"));
00277             CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxSetMasterTimebaseRate(task, 10e6));
00278         }
00279     }
00280 }

00283 XNIDAQmxInterface::getNIDAQmxErrMessage()
00284 {
00285 #ifdef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00286     char str[2048];
00287     DAQmxGetExtendedErrorInfo(str, sizeof(str));
00288     errno = 0;
00289     return QString(str);
00290 #else
00291     return QString();
00292 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00293 }
00294 QString
00295 XNIDAQmxInterface::getNIDAQmxErrMessage(int status)
00296 {
00297 #ifdef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00298     char str[2048];
00299     DAQmxGetErrorString(status, str, sizeof(str));
00300     errno = 0;
00301     return QString(str);
00302 #else
00303     return QString();
00304 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00305 }
00306 int
00307 XNIDAQmxInterface::checkDAQmxError(int ret, const char*file, int line) {
00308     if(ret >= 0) return ret;
00309     errno = 0;
00310     throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(getNIDAQmxErrMessage(), file, line);
00311     return 0;
00312 }
00313 
00314 void
00315 XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(const char *str, std::deque<std::string> &list)
00316 {
00317     list.clear();
00318     std::string org(str);
00319     const char *del = ", \t";
00320     for(unsigned int pos = 0; pos != std::string::npos; ) {
00321         unsigned int spos = org.find_first_not_of(del, pos);
00322         if(spos == std::string::npos) break;
00323         pos = org.find_first_of(del, spos);
00324         if(pos == std::string::npos)
00325             list.push_back(org.substr(spos));
00326         else
00327             list.push_back(org.substr(spos, pos - spos));
00328     }
00329 }

00331 
00332 XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxInterface(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver) : 
00333     XInterface(name, runtime, driver),
00334     m_productInfo(0L)
00335 {
00336     char buf[2048];
00337     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetSysDevNames(buf, sizeof(buf)));
00338     std::deque<std::string> list;
00339     parseList(buf, list);
00340     for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); it++) {
00341         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevProductType(it->c_str(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00342         device()->add(*it + " [" + buf + "]");
00343     }
00344 }
00345 XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute::XNIDAQmxRoute(const char*src, const char*dst, int *pret)
00346     : m_src(src), m_dst(dst)
00347 {
00348 #ifdef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00349     if(pret) {
00350         int ret = 0;
00351         ret = DAQmxConnectTerms(src, dst, DAQmx_Val_DoNotInvertPolarity);
00352         if(ret < 0)
00353             m_src.clear();
00354         *pret = ret;
00355     }
00356     else {
00357         try {
00358             CHECK_DAQMX_ERROR(DAQmxConnectTerms(src, dst, DAQmx_Val_DoNotInvertPolarity));
00359             dbgPrint(QString("Connect route from %1 to %2.").arg(src).arg(dst));
00360         }
00361         catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00362             e.print();
00363             m_src.clear();
00364         }
00365     }
00366 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00367 }
00368 XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute::~XNIDAQmxRoute()
00369 {
00370     if(!m_src.length()) return;
00371     try {
00372         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxDisconnectTerms(m_src.c_str(), m_dst.c_str()));
00373         dbgPrint(QString("Disconnect route from %1 to %2.").arg(m_src).arg(m_dst));
00374     }
00375     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00376         e.print();
00377     }
00378 }
00379 void
00380 XNIDAQmxInterface::open() throw (XInterfaceError &)
00381 {
00382 #ifdef HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00383     char buf[256];
00384 
00385     if(sscanf(device()->to_str().c_str(), "%256s", buf) != 1)
00386         throw XOpenInterfaceError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00387 
00388     XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(g_daqmx_mutex);
00389     if(g_daqmx_open_cnt == 0) {
00390 //      CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxCreateTask("", &g_task_sync_master));
00391         char buf[2048];     
00392         CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetSysDevNames(buf, sizeof(buf)));
00393         std::deque<std::string> list;
00394         XNIDAQmxInterface::parseList(buf, list);
00395         std::deque<std::string> pcidevs;
00396         for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); it++) {
00397             // Device reset.
00398             DAQmxResetDevice(it->c_str());
00399             // Search for master clock among PCI(e) devices.
00400             int32 bus;
00401             DAQmxGetDevBusType(it->c_str(), &bus);
00402             if((bus == DAQmx_Val_PCI) || (bus == DAQmx_Val_PCIe)) {
00403                 pcidevs.push_back(*it);
00404             }
00405         }
00406         if(pcidevs.size() > 1) {
00407             for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = pcidevs.begin(); it != pcidevs.end(); it++) {
00408                 CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevProductType(it->c_str(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00409                 std::string type = buf;
00410                 for(const ProductInfo *pit = sc_productInfoList; pit->type; pit++) {
00411                     if((pit->type == type) && (pit->series == std::string("S"))) {
00412                         //M series device cannot export 20MHzTimebase freely.
00413                         //RTSI synchronizations.
00414                         shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute> route;
00415                         float64 freq = 20.0e6;
00416                         route.reset(new XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute(
00417                                         formatString("/%s/20MHzTimebase", it->c_str()).c_str(),
00418                                         formatString("/%s/RTSI7", it->c_str()).c_str()));
00419                         g_daqmx_sync_routes.push_back(route);
00420                         fprintf(stderr, "20MHz Reference Clock exported from %s\n", it->c_str());
00421                         g_pciClockMaster = *it;
00422                         g_pciClockMasterRate = freq;
00423                         break;
00424                     }
00425                 }
00426                 if(g_pciClockMaster.length())
00427                     break;
00428             }
00429             if(!g_pciClockMaster.length()) {
00430                 for(std::deque<std::string>::iterator it = pcidevs.begin(); it != pcidevs.end(); it++) {
00431                     //Assuming M series only.
00432                     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevProductType(it->c_str(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00433                     std::string type = buf;
00434                     for(const ProductInfo *pit = sc_productInfoList; pit->type; pit++) {
00435                         if((pit->type == type) && (pit->series == std::string("M"))) {
00436                             //RTSI synchronizations.
00437                             shared_ptr<XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute> route;
00438                             float64 freq = 10.0e6;
00439                             route.reset(new XNIDAQmxInterface::XNIDAQmxRoute(
00440                                             formatString("/%s/10MHzRefClock", it->c_str()).c_str(),
00441                                             formatString("/%s/RTSI7", it->c_str()).c_str()));
00442                             g_daqmx_sync_routes.push_back(route);
00443                             fprintf(stderr, "10MHz Reference Clock exported from %s\n", it->c_str());
00444                             g_pciClockMaster = *it;
00445                             g_pciClockMasterRate = freq;
00446                             break;
00447                         }
00448                     }
00449                 }
00450             }
00451         }
00452     }
00453     g_daqmx_open_cnt++;
00454 
00455     std::string devname = buf;
00456     CHECK_DAQMX_RET(DAQmxGetDevProductType(devname.c_str(), buf, sizeof(buf)));
00457     std::string type = buf;
00458     
00459     m_productInfo = NULL;
00460     for(const ProductInfo *it = sc_productInfoList; it->type; it++) {
00461         if(it->type == type) {
00462             m_productInfo = it;
00463             m_devname = devname;
00464             return;
00465         }
00466     }
00467     throw XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("No device info. for product [%1].").arg(type), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00468 #endif //HAVE_NI_DAQMX
00469 }
00470 void
00471 XNIDAQmxInterface::close() throw (XInterfaceError &)
00472 {
00473     m_productInfo = NULL;
00474     if(m_devname.length()) {
00475         m_devname.clear();
00476 
00477         XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(g_daqmx_mutex);
00478         g_daqmx_open_cnt--;
00479         if(g_daqmx_open_cnt == 0) {
00480             g_daqmx_sync_routes.clear();
00481             g_pciClockMaster.clear();
00482         }
00483     }
00484 }
